content: शरण्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [शरणे साधुः यत्] {@--1@} Fit to protect, yielding protection, a protector, refuge; असौ शरण्यः शरणोन्मुखानां <ls>R. 6. 21</ls>; शरण्यो लोकानां <ls>Mv. 4. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 30</ls>; <ls n="R.">14. 64</ls>, <ls n="R.">15. 2</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 76.</ls> {@--2@} Needing protection, poor, miserable. --ण्यः An epithet of Śiva. --ण्यं {@--1@} A place of refuge, shelter. {@--2@} A protector, who or what affords protection; <ls>U. 1. 50</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> {@--3@} Protection, defence. {@--4@} Injury, hurt.
